dt: {bc}of, relating to, involving, or occurring by cellular {d_link|mitosis|mitosis}

dt.t: Microtubules move material through the cell and, in particular, form an important component of the {wi}mitotic{/wi} {d_link|spindle|spindle:1}, which is a structure that separates the duplicated sets of chromosomes in the course of cell division.

shortdef: of, relating to, involving, or occurring by cellular mitosis
